Master of Education   All students in the GPPA program for a Masters of Education will choose a specific program of focus. The options for GPPA students are listed below.   Early Childhood  Educational Studies  Language Literacies and Learners  Measure, Evaluation, Statistics and Assessment (MESA)  Science Education (must earn an undergraduate degree in one of the following areas: Physics, Chemistry, Earth and Environmental Sciences, Biological Sciences, or Engineering Physics)  Special Education          Business         .
